events.message: The policyholder reported a car accident involving a collision with another vehicle on May 1st during morning traffic.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after review of the initial report and involved vehicles.
An agent was assigned promptly to handle the vehicle collision claim and contact the insured for further details.
The insured was contacted to acknowledge receipt of the claim and outline the next steps in processing.
The claimant was asked to submit photos of the damaged vehicle and the police accident report for investigation.
All requested documents including pictures of the car damage and official accident report were submitted by the insured.
Investigation into the car collision claim has commenced with a review of evidence and contacting involved parties.
The investigation concluded that the claimant was not at fault, verifying the collision circumstances from all evidence.
A fair settlement amount was proposed to cover the repair costs of the damaged vehicle based on the investigation.
The claimant expressed satisfaction with the settlement offer and the timely communication throughout the claim process.
The claim was approved by the claims department authorizing the payment for vehicle repair expenses.
Payment has been issued directly to the insuredâ€™s repair shop to cover all authorized vehicle damage repairs.
The claim was successfully closed after confirmation that repairs were completed and customer was satisfied.
All documents and correspondence related to the vehicle collision claim have been archived for future reference.
